kineticstoolkit.dev module¶

Provide fonctions related to development, tests and release of Kinetics Toolkit.

Note

This module is addressed to Kinetics Toolkit’s developers only.

Functions

build_tutorials()

Build the markdown from notebooks tutorials.

build_website([clean])

Build the website using sphinx.

clean()

Remove outputs in jupyter notebooks (before committing to git).

compile_for_pypi()

Compile for PyPi.

release()

Run all functions for release, without packaging and uploading.

run_doc_tests()

Run all doc tests.

run_static_type_checker()

Run static typing checker (mypy).

run_unit_tests()

Run all unit tests.

upload_to_pypi()

Upload to PyPi.
kineticstoolkit.dev.build_tutorials()¶

Build the markdown from notebooks tutorials.

Return type

None

kineticstoolkit.dev.build_website(clean=False)¶

Build the website using sphinx.

Set clean to True to make clean beforehand.

Return type

None

kineticstoolkit.dev.clean()¶

Remove outputs in jupyter notebooks (before committing to git).

Return type

None

kineticstoolkit.dev.compile_for_pypi()¶

Compile for PyPi.

Return type

None

kineticstoolkit.dev.release()¶

Run all functions for release, without packaging and uploading.

Return type

None

kineticstoolkit.dev.run_doc_tests()¶

Run all doc tests.

Return type

None

kineticstoolkit.dev.run_static_type_checker()¶

Run static typing checker (mypy).

Return type

None

kineticstoolkit.dev.run_unit_tests()¶

Run all unit tests.

Return type

None

kineticstoolkit.dev.upload_to_pypi()¶

Upload to PyPi. Only works on macOS for now.

Return type

None
